hero.title: Eliminate Confusion
hero.subtitle: Build the Dashboard You Actually Need

point1.title: Jumping between 5 different analytics tools daily
point1.description: Switching tabs, logging in and out, trying to piece together insights from multiple platforms.

point2.title: Staring at dashboards wondering what it all means
point2.description: Data overload without clear insights. Numbers everywhere but no understanding of what matters.

point3.title: Spending hours creating reports manually
point3.description: Copy-pasting data, formatting spreadsheets, trying to make it look professional for clients.

point4.title: Not knowing which metrics actually matter
point4.description: Drowning in data but missing the key insights that drive real business decisions.

step1.title: Connect
step1.description: Link all your data sources in one place - GA, Facebook, Google Ads, and more.
step1.dataSourceDescription: Connect all your analytics tools in one unified dashboard.
step1.realTimeDescription: Your data syncs automatically, always up-to-date.

step2.title: Build
step2.description: Drag and drop components to create the perfect dashboard for your needs.
step2.preBuiltDescription: Choose from a library of ready-made widgets and charts.
step2.dragDropDescription: Create custom dashboards with an intuitive, no-code interface.
step2.smartTemplatesDescription: Start with professionally designed dashboard templates.

step3.title: Understand
step3.description: Get clear, actionable insights that actually make sense and drive decisions.
step3.noCodeDescription: Build powerful dashboards without writing a single line of code.
step3.aiPoweredDescription: Ask questions about your data and get instant, intelligent answers from our AI assistant.

chatMessages.user1: Why did revenue drop last week?
chatMessages.ai1: Revenue dropped 12% due to decreased traffic from social media campaigns. Your email campaigns performed 23% better.
chatMessages.ai2: /products has 45K sessions with 3.8% conversion. It's your top page. Consider promoting it more.
chatMessages.ai3: Focus on mobile optimization. Mobile users have 2.1% conversion vs 4.5% on desktop. Also, reduce checkout steps.
